Title: Import Subscribers & Schedule Launch Email Sequence
Labels: marketing,email

Summary:
Import the 1500-subscriber CSV and schedule the 5-email launch sequence from `EMAIL_BLAST_TEMPLATES.md` using Mailchimp (or Azure email).

Checklist:
- [ ] Export subscribers from Azure/CSV and clean list
- [ ] Import into Mailchimp and map fields
- [ ] Replace placeholders with actual Gumroad links and UTM parameters
- [ ] Schedule the 5-email launch sequence
